name: Happening
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fGammaAdj=1.500000
fVideoEchoZoom=2.000000
fVideoEchoAlpha=2.000000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
fDecay=0.980000
nWaveMode=2
bAdditiveWaves=2
bWaveDots=5
bRedBlueStereo=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=1
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bMotionVectorsOn=2
nMotionVectorsX=12
nMotionVectorsY=23
fWaveAlpha=1.000000
fWaveScale=1.605000
fWaveSmoothing=0.700000
fWaveParam=0.000000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=2.000000
fWarpScale=2.853000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=3.000000
zoom=1.064000
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.000000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.500000
wave_g=0.500000
wave_b=0.500000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.500*( 0.30*sin(0.933*time) + 0.40*sin(1.045*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.500*( 0.70*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(0.956*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.500*( 0.20*sin(0.910*time) + 0.40*sin(0.920*time) );
per_frame_4=zoom = zoom + 0.013*( 0.60*sin(0.339*time) + 0.40*sin(0.276*time) );
per_frame_5=rot = rot + 0.040*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_6=decay = decay - 0.02*equal(frame%50,0);
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+(bass_att-1)*0.1;
fRating=5.000000
